siteMetadata.name: Ali Habibi
siteMetadata.title: Ali Habibi | Machine Learning and LLM engineer
siteMetadata.description: As a Machine Learning Engineer and LLM enthusiast, I'm driven to make a meaningful impact through innovation.
siteMetadata.about: Machine Learning Engineer with over 3 years of experience spanning deep learning, machine learning, and full-stack development, including mobile and backend engineering. Demonstrated expertise in designing, developing, and deploying machine learning models into production environments, with a strong focus on scalability and performance. Experienced in working with Large Language Models (LLMs), Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), and tokenizer systems. Passionate about cloud computing and machine learning operations (MLOps), and eager to pursue cutting-edge research in academic and industry settings.
